```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)

```



```{r}
palmetto <- read_csv("palmetto.csv") %>% 
  select(species, height:green_lvs) %>% 
  mutate(species = case_when( species==1 ~ "serenoa repens",
                              species==2 ~ "sabal etonia"))
```


```{r}
ggplot(data=palmetto, aes(x=height, y=length))+
  geom_point( cex=0.2, alpha=0.2)+
  facet_wrap(~species)+
  labs( x= "height (cm)",
          y= "length (cm)")
  
```

```{r}
ggplot(data=palmetto, aes(x=green_lvs))+
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 1)+
  facet_wrap(~species)+
  labs( x = "number of green leaves (n)",
        y = "count")
```

```{r}
ggplot(data=palmetto, aes(x=height))+
  geom_histogram()+
  facet_wrap(~species)+
  labs(x="height (cm)")
```
```{r}
summary_palmetto <- palmetto %>% 
  group_by(species) %>% 
  summarize(mean = mean(height, na.rm=TRUE),
            sd = sd(height, na.rm=TRUE),
            #median = median(weight, na.rm=TRUE),
            n = n()
            )
```
